pwa.util

Class CmdLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • pwa.util.CmdLogger

  • public class CmdLogger
extends java.lang.Object

    Personal Web Application (PWA) Command Logger

    The purpose of this logger is to log command processing status. The log file is created in OS' temporary directory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
